channel.title: Our Bodies, Our Souls I: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Rebbetzin Tzipora Heller

item.title: Our Bodies, Our Souls
item.description: Forget the glass ceilings you are expected to exceed. Take a different route to smooth out the impossible juggling act between life, work and everyone else's expectations.
item.itunes:author: Rebbetzin Tzipora Heller
